sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Grid, Button } from '@mui/material' import { ValidatorForm, TextValidator } from 'react-material-ui-form-validator' import { Box, styled } from '@mui/system' const DialogContent = styled('div')(({ theme }) => ({ textAlign: 'center', position: 'relative', padding: '24px !important', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { padding: '16px !important', }, })) const IMG = styled('img')(({ theme }) => ({ height: 160, marginBottom: 2 })) const PaymentDialog = ({ open, toggleDialog }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({}) const handleChange = (event) => { event.persist() setState({ ...state, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = () => { } let { cardHolderName, cardNumber, expiryDate, cvc } = state return ( ) } export default PaymentDialog
